QuestData.Title: The Southern Flank
QuestData.Description: Our new arrangement with the Horde will put my people in direct conflict with the Alliance.$B$BBring. Them. On.$B$BAs we speak, the Alliance moves up the peninsula to threaten Dragonmaw Port.$B$BFind Rok'tar to the south - I believe he has set up a command post on one of the shipwrecks - and ensure that the Twilight Shores remain in our control.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rok'tar at the Twilight Shores in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Rok'tar at the Twilight Shores in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Good timing, $c. We were just about to unleash a counter-attack.
